privacy-policy.title: Privacy policy
privacy-policy.description: Privacy Policy of the {title} online store

paragraphs.1: We value your privacy and want you to be sure that your personal data is protected. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data.

2.text_1: We collect information that you provide to us when you use our website or application.

list.4: other information that you provide to us.

paragraphs.3: We use the information we collect to provide you with the services you have requested, as well as to improve our products and services. We may also use your information to send you promotional materials if you have agreed to do so.
paragraphs.4: We take all necessary measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. We use modern technology and strict security procedures to protect your information.
paragraphs.5: We will not sell, exchange or transfer your information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
paragraphs.6: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We recommend that you check this page periodically for any changes.
paragraphs.7: By using our website or application, you agree to this privacy policy and its terms. You also accept and understand the use of cookies

8.text: If you have any questions about the privacy policy or how we use your information, please contact us at:

cookies-policy.title: Cookie Policy
cookies-policy.description: Cookie policy of the online store {title}

paragraphs.1: When visiting the Administration's websites and using the Platform's functionality, the User consents to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy regarding this type of file.
paragraphs.2: Cookies are small text files placed on a user's computer by sites they have visited. They are widely used to make websites work at all or work more efficiently, as well as to provide the necessary information to the site owners. The use of cookies is currently a standard practice for most websites.
paragraphs.3: The administration uses cookies to personalize the content and improve the user experience. The User can control cookies and manage their use through his browser (see section 2.1). Deleting or blocking cookies may affect the user interface of the site and make some of the site's components inaccessible to the User.

4.text_1: Most browsers allow you to view, delete, and block cookies from websites. In this case, if all cookies are deleted, all site settings will be reset for the User. Cookie management instructions for common browsers can be found at the links below:
4.text_2: Information about other browsers and device types is available on {link1} and {link2}.

paragraphs.5: The following section describes the types, categories, and purpose of cookies. The User can disable the use of certain cookies in accordance with the functionality of the browser he uses, as described in section 2.1.
paragraphs.6: The User has the option to refuse to record their anonymized browsing history in analytical cookies on the Administration's websites. The administration uses the services of the providers listed below.

1.title: Mandatory cookies
1.text: These cookies ensure the operation of the Administration's website and/or Platform, and they cannot be disabled. They are usually applied in response to actions performed, for example, to set privacy settings or fill out some forms.The user can configure his browser so that it blocks these cookies or notifies him about them, but in this case some components of the site will stop working.

2.title: Analytical cookies
2.text: These cookies help the Administration to calculate statistics on the number of visitors and investigate traffic sources so that the Administration can evaluate and improve the effectiveness and usability of the site for Users. They allow the Administration to find out which pages are the most popular or are of least interest to Users, and how visitors navigate the site.All information collected by these cookies is aggregated and, accordingly, anonymous. If the User prohibits the use of these cookies, the Administration will not be able to track website traffic and will not be able to regulate its operation.

3.title: Additional cookies
3.text: These cookies help the Administration in researching the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and improve the user-friendliness of the Administration's Internet resources, taking into account User preferences.

4.title: Advertising cookies
4.text: In order to promote its services, collect statistics and conduct research, the Administration may place advertisements on other Internet sites that will be visible to Users. Cookies are used to make offers tailored to the User and their interests. In addition, they are needed to prevent the same advertisement from appearing frequently. These advertisements are intended solely to familiarize Users with the Administration's potentially interesting proposals. The Administration does not sell User data to third parties.

avatarDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete your avatar? Once deleted, it cannot be restored. Default avatar will be set instead deleted avatar

telegramConnect.heading: Confirmation of binding
telegramConnect.description:
To apply, you need to click on the button below, it will redirect you to our telegram bot.
Please be aware that the link is active for 30 minutes only!

telegramDisconnect.heading: Are you sure you want to unlink telegram
telegramDisconnect.description: You definitely want to unlink the telegram account from your account, you will lose the opportunity to receive notifications in our bot

account.title: Account
account.description: The account settings are shown here, you can manage these settings here

password.title: Password
password.description: The password is the key to your account. Don't tell anyone about it. If necessary, you can change it here to improve security

2fa.title: Use two-factor authentication
2fa.description: Ensure the security of your account using two-factor authentication via a bundle of e-mail and a one-time code

fullLogout.title: Use full account logout
fullLogout.description: By fully logging out of your account, you clear the cache and delete all cookies-files related to the design of the site.

tg2fa.title: Use authorization via Telegram
tg2fa.description: Enable sign in via telegram to increase the security of your account (you need to connect a Telegram bot, two-factor authentication and enable notifications in Telegram)

changePasswordModal.title: Password change
changePasswordModal.description: Change your password to whatever you want, if you have two-factor auth enabled, you will need to sign in to your account again after the change

logout.title: Exit | Logout
logout.description: End the session to log out of your account on this device

delete.title: Deleting an account
delete.description: Deleting an account will lead to its complete destruction without the possibility of refund

saveFile.title: Save settings to a file
saveFile.description: Download the settings file in the format .json or .yml. You can share this file with your friends

uploadFile.title: Use settings from file
uploadFile.description: Upload file with settings in the format .json or .yml to use these settings

enabled.description: Allow notifications to come directly to your website and make themselves felt with a pop-up window

sound.title: Enable notification sound
sound.description: Turn on the sound for notifications to know when they arrive

push.title: Push notifications on this device
push.description: Enable push notifications to receive notifications directly to the desktop

site.title: Enable notifications on the site
site.description: Select notifications on the site so that they arrive on the site in the browser

tg.title: Enable notifications in Telegram
tg.description: Turn on Telegram alerts, they will be sent to you in telegram via our bot
